You are my husband. Out of love, affection and in return for love, I hereby declare the following schedule of assets, namely, the property, namely, the saffron and saffron, which were received by me from my parents during my marriage, from the date of receipt to this day, in my possession and complete experience I hereby transfer the said property to you free of charge without any compensation. You shall from now on take possession of the said property and pay all the taxes payable to the Panchayat and enjoy it freely and freely with all the full rights of your children, grandchildren, descendants, and descendants. As per the schedule, the property shall be registered in the accounts of the Gram Panchayat. I hereby declare that I will remove all the feudal encumbrances, whether they arise from anyone or not, at my own expense and will continue to exercise this property without any hindrance. This settlement deed is written and given in your name, stating that the property is an undisputed property that is not subject to any other kind of written or verbal agreements.
This property has not been assigned by the Government. This property has not been given any guarantee either by the Government or by the Government or by the non-Government organizations.
A.P. Government Act No. 9/77 is not applicable to this property.
I hereby declare that the property transferred by this deed does not include any trees or plantations like mango, coconut, sweet potato etc., minerals like granite etc., or stone mines and if any such facts are found in this, I will be prosecuted as per law. I hereby declare that I am responsible for the payment of excise duty.
Nagamani Stone

sections.content:
The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 612 of 2026, dated 27/Jan/2026, executed by Rayi Nagamani in favour of her Husband, Rayi Raju towards the property admeasuring an extent of 71.66 Sq. Yds., comprised in survey number 140/1, situated in Konda Gunturu Village & Grama Panchayati, Rajanagaram Mandal, within the District of East Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Rajanagaram, is bounded as follows:

North by: 21-6 Ft Panchayathi Road
South by: 21-6 Ft Penumanchi Chandrakala Property
East by: 30 Ft Revu Lakshmi Property
West by: 30 Ft R Vara Lakshmi Property
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the scheduled property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
